name: Ritual Run
description:
Try to get to the end of the dungeon to start the ritual.

Controls:

  • A and D to move left and right
  • W and Spacebar to jump
  • 1 and 2 to use ranged and melee attack
  • Escape to quit game

Protip: run away from the big bad invulnerable monster

Created in a week by 4 people just starting to learn to make games, this being the first gamejam project we've worked on. Thank you for playing!
